revised_title: Ancient Coinage: A Comprehensive Study and Collection
tldr: The author provides a detailed account of two books on ancient coinage, focusing on the collection and study of coins from various civilizations. The text discusses the coins' historical significance, inscriptions, metal composition, rarity, and the cabinets where they are preserved. The author also highlights the works of prominent collectors and scholars in the field.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Art history
